entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Webassembly size and performance #91437
  • [8.0] [Long Running Test] System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.CESchedulerPairTests.TestCompletionTask #91434
    8.0.0
  • Provide an implementation of `ReadOnlySpan<Rune>.ToString` #91426
  • Update config binding gen nupkg transitive build target to use granular interceptor opt-in #91419
    8.0.0
  • EventLogger ignores provided EventLogSettings.SourceName #91418
  • .NET7.0: Suppress CA1416 when wrapped in UIDevice.CheckSystemVersion #91412
  • AuthenticateAsClientAsync can fail if renegotiation is requested immediately after handshake #91409
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Hash and HMAC one-shots for HashAlgorithName #91407
    9.0.0
  • TaskAsyncEnumerableExtensions.WithCancellation does not override a cancelled token with an active one. #91397
  • [Mono] Add missing SIMD support for some methods from System.Numerics.Vector2/3/4 on Arm64 #91394
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Reenable disabled x86 SIMD unit tests #91392
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Hot-reload support on browser #91389
    9.0.0
  • [Android][Test] Interop test: Native libraries are missing or incorrectly packaged in the app #91388
    9.0.0
  • Emit custom modifiers into native layout metadata #91381
    9.0.0
  • Config generator overwrites existing properties when provided with empty config section #91380
    8.0.0
  • [browser] [wasm] Remove StringContent special case #91379
    9.0.0
  • .Net 8 Preview sending email exception #91377
    8.0.0
  • C# ADO.NET Transaction Scope Auto Committed Before Calling Complete() #91376
  • [linux-arm64] System.Net.Sockets crashes on AWS Gravitron3 with 7.0.400 SDK #91386
  • corerun with valgrind massif cause a crash #91370
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests.ConcurrentQueueTests.ManyConcurrentAddsTakesPeeks_ForceContentionWithOtherThreadsPeeking(seconds: 1) #91368
  • Possible Issue With Dependency Injection Container Service Resolution #91366

Closed

  • JSMarshalAsAttribute failing error tests #91410
    9.0.0
  • Visual Basic late binding failure on COM objects #90541
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Implement IDirectoryContents on PhysicalDirectoryInfo at MS.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical #86354
    Future
  • [Mono] Regression: amd64 AOT: condition `class1 != ARG_CLASS_NO_CLASS' not met #90955
    8.0.0
  • Reading a file in with StreamReader and writing it out with StreamWriter unconditionally adds a BOM when encoding detection is enabled #91362
  • Internal CLR error (0x80131506) when running IBC collection #90962
    9.0.0
  • dotnet.exe: Need a specific error message when running a .dll of the wrong bitness #85691
    9.0.0
  • [nodejs] bad option: --experimental-wasm-simd #91318
    8.0.0
  • .NET SDK on Ubuntu 18.04.6 libnethost.a contains inexisting libstdc++ symbol #91067
  • ReadItemAsync 'Hangs' in .Net 8.0, but works in .Net 7.0 #90943
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Specify default value for OrDefault Linq Methods #91396
  • Constructor function of System.IO.FileInfo won't throw other exceptions? #91369
  • Clang LLVM emitting float instrinsics for bitwise operation for every input #74661
    Future
  • [Mono] Re-enable hardware intrinsics tests when LLVM JIT is enabled for llvmaot lanes #75767
    Future
  • [mono] Tracking: Upgrade LLVM-JIT to ver. 14 #75757
    Future
  • Make Sure LLVM Zero Extends Word in JIT Mode #75712
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!(checkUnusedValues && def->IsUnusedValue()) && "operands should never be marked as unused values"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #91273
    8.0.0
  • NativeLib is ignored without PublishAot #91353
    Future
  • we are embeding mono with ue how can we disable reload satellite assembly(*.resource.dll)? #90010
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Please reinstate CustomMarshalers.TypeToTypeInfoMarshaler for COM #91307
    Future
  • C# Dapper Transaction Scope is not rollbacking for DB2 Provider #91326
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.SEHException blocking runtime-coreclr superpmi-collect pipeline #90947
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #91436
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #91435
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Add late binding lookup in VB.NET for COM objects #91433
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-consider, area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Options Source Gen Fixes #91432
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Remove browser wasm from perf_slow #91429
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91424
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Interop-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91422
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.x
  • [NO MERGE] Bump mono to -std=gnu11 #91421
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0] [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91417
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Interop-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use SequenceEqual in BigInteger.Equals #91416
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix NativeAOT unhandled exception stack trace #91415
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V, LoongArch64] Fix assert(!regArgMaskLive) in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs #91414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix x64 crossbuild on macOS arm64 #91413
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Expand CreateSpan in T0 #91403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Microsoft.Bcl.Numerics.Tests: fix restore failure when DotNetBuildFromSource. #91402
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [nodejs] Remove experimental wasm arguments from template #91401
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Reenable C4244 MSVC warning and fix occurrences #91395
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][jit] Support for DivRem intrinsic on x86-64. #91393
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Prevent other threads from writing to a session once rundown begins #91383
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix LDTOKEN of methods that have modifiers #91382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix runtime dispatch to static virtuals on interface types #91374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Add Native AOT Pri0 test leg #91373
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Allow superpmi.exe to find a default JIT #91371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove libraries_tests PMI collection #91365
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix arm64/arm32 cross-DAC #91425
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update 6.0 branch to use Ubuntu 22.04 queues for Perf runs #90762
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Update 7.0 to use Ubuntu 22.04 queues for Perf runs #90767
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.23 #91404
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.12 #91405
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Options Source Gen Fixes #91363
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add late binding lookup in VB.NET for COM objects #91399
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, 9.0.0
  • Implement IDirectoryContents on PhysicalDirectoryInfo #91024
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [DependencyInjection] introduce feature switch to disable S.R.E #91352
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix nullable annotation for Validator.TryValidateValue and ValidateValue #91293
    Servicing-approved, area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Update binder gen emitted-interceptor nullability to match framework impl #91359
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Test hot/cold splitting in runtime-coreclr crossgen2 pipeline #91217
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91292
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove some manual test scaffolding #89653
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add error message for loading assembly with incompatible architecture #91289
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add link to docs to interop error messages #91328
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 9.0.0
  • Revert "[wasm] Add link to docs to interop error messages" #91408
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • new synchronization mechanism for DATAS #90726
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [nodejs] Remove experimental wasm arguments from template #91384
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use live illink to trim framework #91233
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Add blazor startup measurements to browser-bench #91199
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Upgrade our TFM to net9.0 #90880
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Support Windows based ECDSA SignedCms #91247
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Remove DirectoryInfo.ToString() from ref assembly #91354
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Emit armv8.4 ldapur* for volatile loads with contained offsets #89681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Print message arguments in forwarded console #91315
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2256435 #91360
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][jit] Optimize OP_R8CONST and OP_R4CONST on Arm64 #91225
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix arm64/arm32 cross-DAC #91438
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [7.0] Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90343
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 7.0.x
  • Fix impNonConstFallback #91345
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix allocation in DateTime.TryParse when it returns false #91303
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • Switch to python generated source #91140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Add New Test to Track Number of Jitted Methods #91235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Remove FEATURE_BASICFREEZE #91132
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [ARM64] Add g_GCShadowEnd to JIT_WriteBarrier_Table #91342
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft][browser] Run unit tests on multithreaded runtime with multithreaded xunit runner #91317
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, os-browser
  • Adding a naive implementation of various primitive tensor operations #91228
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove --skip-unresolved from illink #91007
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] Fix implementation of NegotiateAuthentication.Wrap for Kerberos on Windows #91311
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, regression-from-last-release, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add optimisation of incrementing SELECT at lowering on arm64. #91262
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] ELT Profiler Bring-Up #91313
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] [wasm] Request Streaming upload #91295
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix Dispose and SendData Race on Http3 Test #91291
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • [RISC-V] Initial commit for libraries directory #90203
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-riscv, 9.0.0
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution

  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasm symbols #91241

  • Improve perf of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #91290
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet new should support multi-targeting #35065

Closed

  • .NET 8 CLI produces extraneous modifications when updating support packages in multitarget project #35052
  • Unable to load shared library 'hostfxr' or one of its dependencies on Alpine inside Docker #31848

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid loading all types when invoking Hot Reload handlers, handle type load failures #35077
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update branding to 7.0.402 #35074
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.309 #35073
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.112 #35072
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.415 #35071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.318 #35070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.123 #35069
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35068
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Validate install-scripts changes #35063
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update CODEOWNERS for libraries compat tools #35061
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35023
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: LogHttpResponseAsync: include request method, and don't format a message when trace logging is not enabled. #35062
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Add DOTNET_LAUNCH_PROFILE environment when invoking dotnet run #35029
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2257066 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Add test for PublishSingleFile+PublishAot #34948
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • 9500 dotnet tool install: Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade when specify version #31549
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Parameter name InlineHints should ignore `this.` and `base.` #69793
  • Display inherited documentation as an adornment #69789
  • [BUG] The IDE0022 analyzer mistakenly suggests/fixes code that includes preprocessor directives #69783
  • C# Insert spaces within Square brackets doesn't apply to attributes #69781
  • KeyNotFoundException thrown by FindSymbols.StreamingProgressCollector.OnReferenceFoundAsync #69780
  • Parse errors when conditional directives are combined with raw string literals #69776
    17.8
  • C# out param is not reported as an error in visual studio if a local function is called. #69775
  • ArraySegment<byte> in async method leaves Array null #69777
  • Can not resolve symbol method when using System.Diagnostics.Conditional #69773

Closed

  • Tracking issue to ensure collection spread expression are target typed properly. #69625
  • Improve interpolated string handler compilation errors #66235
    Backlog
  • Rename feature (CRTL + R + R) does not work as intended in an edge case #68880
    17.8 P4

PullRequests

Created

  • Add analysis and emit difference time spans to EnC telemetry #69794
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add support for reading runsettings passed by the client #69792
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Slightly fewer allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #69791
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch to background thread before accessing options #69790
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69788
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove well known implicit conversion method #69787
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pack our language server in a separate package for each platform #69786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch PatternMatcher to use a TemporaryArray instead of ArrayBuilder. #69784
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refactoring of synthesized types tracking across EnC generations #69782
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Update the severity combo boxes in EditorConfig UX to reflect the correct semantics #69778
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Feature - Editor Config UI
  • Parameters #69774
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Bump decompiler for debugger #69772
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Validate that only BoundConversion can have a field typed Conversion #69785
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Improve interpolated string handler compilation error #69671
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Bump telemetry for fix on ExeName/Version #69771
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update PublicAPI for 17.7 #69767
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Fix the ArgumentOutOfRangeException in inline rename #69708
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add extra validation for Compilations having the expected trees #69747
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add System.IO.Pipelines to Version.Details for source-build #69719
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update TFM in tests to net8.0 #69669
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Trim ToString calls when converting to interpolated strings when there are interpolated string handlers available. #69723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Lazily build a case-insensitive comparison for performance #69756
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: support builder methods returning derived or implementing types #69770
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2257089 #69366
  • Reduce cascading diagnostics on failed implicit conversion #69170
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update "Current Document" background analysis semantics and fix Full Solution analysis with project config changes #69750
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove EditorFeatures.Cocoa and VSMac IVTs #69765
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Race condition in shared form mapping resolution logic #50464
  • Redis OutputCache no longer works on rc1 #50452
  • BlazorEnableCompression flag is ignored when publishing Blazor WASM projects #50451
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50449

Closed

  • UserManager.IsInRoleAsync(appUser, "rolename") and User.IsInrole("rolename") may return different results #50125
  • Crash due to INVALID_POINTER_READ NativeRequestContext.GetRequestInfo #50445
  • Templates for previous frameworks are not available on .NET 8 (nightly) rc builds #50390
  • it is possible to use the [Authorize] attribute in Blazor controllers #50392

PullRequests

Created

  • Tidy up aka.ms links in data protection error messages #50465
    area-dataprotection
  • Merge property attributes with parameter attributes for AsParameters #50458
    area-minimal
  • Split redis output-cache pieces from Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchange.Redis into Microsoft.AspNetCore.OutputCaching.StackExchangeRedis #50457
    area-middleware
  • Fix outputcache bug when using IOutputCacheBufferStore #50455
    area-networking
  • Fix scripts in SSR updates #50453
    area-blazor
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Validate install-scripts changes #50450
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix pRequestInfo INVALID_POINTER_READ caused by GCs (v7 backport) #50448
    Servicing-approved, community-contribution, area-networking, 7.0.x
  • Fix pRequestInfo INVALID_POINTER_READ caused by GCs (v6 backport) #50447
    Servicing-approved, community-contribution, area-networking, 6.0.x
  • Fix exception handling for complex form mapping in minimal APIs #50444
    feature-rdg, area-minimal

Merged

  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #50163
    area-infrastructure, area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Update branding to 6.0.23 #50461
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.23
  • Rename area-runtime in fabricbot #50460
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Update branding to 7.0.12 #50462
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.12
  • [release/8.0] Fix pRequestInfo INVALID_POINTER_READ caused by GCs #50459
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-networking, 8.0-rc2
  • Update milestones for October servicing #50463
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix pRequestInfo INVALID_POINTER_READ caused by GCs #50446
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Update SDK to 9.0.100-alpha.1.23421.9 #49911
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50422
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix Set size in HttpLoggingOptions #50426
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
    area-networking
  • Make MapIdentityApi DTOs public #50247
    area-identity
  • [Blazor] APIs to preserve content between enhanced navigations #50437
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2257055 #49575
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50443
    area-networking
  • [Blazor] Form mapping support for select multiple, logging, DataMember and other improvements/cleanups #50431
    area-blazor
  • SignalR MessageBuffer fixes #50315
    area-signalr
  • Suppress nullability warning when resolving JSON body or service #50410
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Fix corrupted streaming SSR output #50380
    area-blazor, .NET 8 Planning

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • CLRMD don't provide StackBase and StackLimit for full memory dumps #4198
    9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entire page glitches when using Shell #17157
  • On Maui Android, page dimennsions are always empty #17154
  • Maui ~ MediaElement: audio file playback does not reset to beginning after playing back once in Anddroid emulator but works correctly in Windows app #17153
  • Numeric Entry uses wrong decimal separator in MAUI app running on Android #17152
  • Maui on windows emulator dont do Swipe like it do on Android emulator #17151
  • Missing XAML element content in release version but not debug version #17149
  • A new class created in Platform/Android folder of .NET MAUI project will have wrong namespace #17148
  • Method not found: void Microsoft.Maui.Controls.TapGestureRecognizer.add_Tapped(System.EventHandler) in .Net MAUI targeting .Net 7 #17147
  • Cannot directly type culture (e.g. 'en-US') for a CultureInfo property in .NET MAUI XAML #17146
  • Maui android Shell.PresentationMode="Modal" bug when rotate the device #17145
  • MediaElement Record Audio #17144
  • Clean up the `<UseRidGraph>` usage #17142
    .NET 8 GA
  • [tests] Investigate why tabbed page navigated event fires earlier #17141
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7] Entry Numeric keyboard type is not working #17137
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] System.TypeLoadException with .NET 8 #17136
    .NET 8 GA
  • Button With Gradient Backgroud and Shadow is not visible on iOS #17135
  • NullReferenceException in Platform.DidAppear on iOS when migrating from Xamarin Forms. #17133
  • [iOS] Button in ScrollView has NO clicked effect #17132
  • Maui Blazor Hybrid App Crushes after splash Screen on Android Release Mode #17131
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Maui Hybrid App stuck on "Loading..." in release mode on Android #17130
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] - AndroidMessageHandler - Cannot access a disposed object #17129
    .NET 8 GA
  • Button text does not clear on iOS using button.Text = "" or button.Text = null #17128
  • CollectionView's scroll is not continuous #17127
  • Migration from Xamarin to MAUI - Title bar is not coming in children pages and tabs pages #17126
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc1] Grid rows aren't same height on iOS #17125
    .NET 8 GA
  • Out of box support for read and write Exif data on all platforms. #17124
  • TableSection and TableRoot Title properties are displayed as lower case on Windows. #17123
  • [Android] - Cursor Resets to the Beginning When Typing Letters with TextTransform #17122

Closed

  • PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #16978
  • XAML Hot Reload not working for Android after Visual Studio Update to 17.6.4 #15842
  • AutomationProperties not working in release mode #16491
  • MediaPicker.CaptureVideoAsync() returns null on Android API 33 (Android 13.0) #16879
  • Fix all cases where platform values are propagating to xplat code to use SetValueFromRenderer #16654
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] TwoWay Binding does not work when value is changed from the source ViewModel #16849
    .NET 8 GA
  • Inconsistent content length calling WCF service #16957
  • Entry background color does not change when two radio buttons change event. #17053
    .NET 8 + Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • (Windows) ImageButton contents now explicitly stretches #17159
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Add a second set of borders to the Border Resize Content sample #17158
  • PermissionStatus: Remove "ios only" from documentation of Restricted #17156
    community ✨
  • Drag and Drop move suppression for older android builds #17150
    platform/android 🤖, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [tests] Ignore appium visual test #15330 while we investigate #17143
    area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 branch #17139
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Update BindableObject API docs #17138
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    .NET 8 GA

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17119
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update BindableObject API docs #17099
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Run the API diff against stable versions #17118
    8.0-rc1
  • Bump the androidx group with 1 update #17103
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [C] 2W bindings always apply #17110
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1901.177 to 1.0.1938.49 #17059
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17121
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 GA
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122

  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮, Under Consideration
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17104
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • Add .NET 7 to the NuGet packages #17048

  • [main] Build the previous .NET version of some nugets #17043

  • [net8.0] Build the previous .NET version of some nugets #17042

  • Update Windows App SDK #16610

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expose `LambdaExpression` support for Compiled Queries #31604
  • RC1: UnreachableException when loading with proxies and a JSON-mapped complex property #31597
  • Incorrect version of dotnet ef tools - why so difficult to upgrade? #31596
  • Default value forced when converting an EXISTING string column to be non-nullable #31595

Closed

  • Sqlite: Cast from char to int gives incorrect results #23161
    8.0.0-rc2
  • CreateAggregate state is shared, breaking multiple use of an aggregate function in the same query #26070
    8.0.0-rc2
  • Exclude only base type table from Migrations #30079
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Block has-pending-model-changes when EF < 8 #31605
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31603
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #31602
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31601
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • SQLite: Fix casting between int and char #31585
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw from 2.1.6-pre20230809203314 to 2.1.6 #31548
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Update branding to 6.0.23 #31599
  • Update branding to 7.0.12 #31600
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Only try sqlite3_win32_set_directory on Windows and be more resilient #31532
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Use aggregate_context instead of user_state in CreateAggregate #31531
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31598
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Don't exclude from migrations derived tables for TPT and TPC #31594
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31582
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Validate complex properties are not null when saving #31584
